meaningMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>summit</kanji> and this word means <vocabulary>summit</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>peak</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>top</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>crown</vocabulary>, most often in reference to mountains.
readingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You should already know this reading from when you learned 頂く. If you can remember that, you can remember this too!
